protocol.text: Seedlings were grown in the MS liquid medium for 14 days under constant light at 23 degree and then treated with chitooctaose

Seedlings grown hydroponically were treated wtih chitooctaose at a final concentration of 1 um for 30 minutes. The collected seedlings were frozen in liquid nitrogen for RNA isolation uisng the Trizol solution (Invitrogen).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 8 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, Affymetrix).
Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Seedlings were grown in the MS liquid medium for 14 days under constant light at 23 degree and then treated with water
Seedlings grown hydroponically were treated wtih water for 30 minutes (as a contro). The collected seedlings were frozen in liquid nitrogen for RNA isolation uisng the Trizol solution (Invitrogen).
Seedlings grown hydroponically were treated wtih water for 30 minutes (as a control). The collected seedlings were frozen in liquid nitrogen for RNA isolation uisng the Trizol solution (Invitrogen).
